from sortedcontainers import SortedList


class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        sl_sum = SortedList((x + y for x, y in points))
        sl_diff = SortedList((x - y for x, y in points))
        
        res = inf
        for x, y in points:
            sl_sum.remove(x + y)
            sl_diff.remove(x - y)
            res = min(res, max(sl_sum[-1] - sl_sum[0], sl_diff[-1] - sl_diff[0]))
            sl_sum.add(x + y)
            sl_diff.add(x - y)
        
        return res
